value:
I wonder if any of us will ever see a
world that's happy, prosperous,
and free of conflict?

In my world, I'm constantly being
helped by my brother. It's rather
embarrassing, really.

I'm quite well, thank you. You're
most kind to ask.

What sort of world are you from?
One plagued by war? Or one
graced by peace?

I was just practicing my sword
form. My brother would be sure to
scold me if I missed a day.

I've come with greetings on behalf
of $Nf.$k$pMay your friendship grow.

If only Ephraim could see me
now!

Glad to see my daily training
pay off!

My brother would never let me
forget this.

Surely this will help make up for
my lack of sheer strength.

My name is Eirika. I'm not fond of
fighting, but I'll do my best to support
your cause.

Do you think I've gotten strong
enough? Let me just say that if
you're happy, then I'm happy.$k$pWhen I was a child, my father and
brother praised how gentle I was.
I value such a quality.$k$pBut it can be a weakness in the
face of oppression or deception.
I wish it wasn't true, but it is.$k$pWhen you need to protect those
you must, strength is crucial.$k$pStill, I refuse to give up my
kindness and compassion.$k$pYou have helped me stay my
course—growing stronger while
remaining myself.$k$pFor that, I thank you and
continue to pledge myself to
your cause!
えいっ！
やぁっ！
きゃああっ！
No...
Now it's my turn!
I will give it my all!
I cannot allow this!
If this is war, so be it.
Ephraim...
Heehee
I am grateful for your kindness.
Ah! Oh, no more of that. You'll vex me!
It's best to resolve conflict without fighting. When possible.
Would you be willing to assist with my sword training?
How curious. I feel such warmth and hope when near you.
My brother and I, and our friend Lyon—we once had grand ideas about the future.
Promise me, please, that you won't leave me alone.
Yes?
Ready.
Let's go.
